short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take Full Page Screenshot for Free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Full Page Screenshot" : Capture full-page screenshots effortlessly with our Chrome extension. Seamlessly integrated into your browser, our extension offers a convenient way to capture entire web pages with just a click. No more hassle of stitching together multiple screenshots – our tool does it all for you. 

----

Seamless Integration: Our extension seamlessly integrates into the Chrome browser for easy access.

Capture Full-Page Screenshots: Capture entire web pages with just one click, eliminating the need for manual scrolling and multiple screenshots.

Effortless Operation: Say goodbye to the hassle of stitching together screenshots – our extension does all the work for you.

Save and Share: Save screenshots locally and share them with others.

Privacy and Security: No Data stored in our server. All magic happens in your own browser
